name: Jogo da Velha (JJR - Jogos Independentes)
description:
Jogo da Velha (JJR - Jogos Independentes) is a strategy game developed by JJR - Jogos Independentes. It was originally released in 2018.
Jogo da Velha (JJR - Jogos Independentes) is available on Android. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
